purpose: Facilitate the integration of large language models (LLMs) into applications, enabling developers to build intelligent systems quickly.
principle: Builds on top of OpenAI and other LLMs, providing a set of tools and abstractions to simplify the integration process.
reusability: Offers a modular SDK with APIs and plugins for easy integration into various applications, supporting extensibility through custom connectors.
limitations: Primarily supports C# and .NET environments, with limited language support beyond English, and requires understanding of LLMs for effective use.
name: semantic-kernel
description: Integrate cutting-edge LLM technology quickly and easily into your apps
highlight: Seamlessly integrates large language models into applications with a focus on extensibility and ease of use.
